thread.title: ZMDI a Global Semiconductor Company Is Proud to Be Exhibiting at Europes Leading Exhibition for Electric Automation SPS IPC Drives 2015 in Nuremburg Germany on November 24-26 2015
thread.title_full: ZMDI a Global Semiconductor Company Is Proud to Be Exhibiting at Europes Leading Exhibition for Electric Automation SPS IPC Drives 2015 in Nuremburg Germany on November 24-26 2015

title: ZMDI a Global Semiconductor Company Is Proud to Be Exhibiting at Europes Leading Exhibition for Electric Automation SPS IPC Drives 2015 in Nuremburg Germany on November 24-26 2015
text:
ZMDI, a Global Semiconductor Company, Is Proud to Be Exhibiting at Europes Leading Exhibition for Electric Automation, SPS IPC Drives 2015, in Nuremburg, Germany, on November 24-26, 2015 
Marketwired Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
DRESDEN, GERMANY--(Marketwired - Oct 22, 2015) - ZMD AG (ZMDI), an award-winning global semiconductor company headquartered in Dresden, Germany, and specializing in enabling energy-efficient solutions, today announces that it will be exhibiting in association with PROFIBUS Nutzerorganisation e.V. at the SPS IPC Drives 2015 tradeshow, a leading exhibition for electric automation technology covering products ranging from complete systems down to integrated automation solutions. ZMDI will be demonstrating their highly reliable technology at booth 220 in Hall 2, which is shared with PROFIBUS Nutzerorganisation e.V. With over 50 years of industry leadership, ZMDI offers superior solutions for power management, sensing, battery management, automotive ASICs and industrial ASSPs. An analog mixed-signal company, ZMDI designs solutions for automotive, industrial, medical, information technology and consumer applications. 
SPS IPC Drives 2015 promises to be an excellent venue for ZMDI to showcase their ZIOL2xxx Line Driver ICs for IO-Link applications. This family of universal and IO-Link-standard-compatible cable drivers is designed for sensor/actuator systems in factory automation. ZMDI is part of the IO-Link community and a member of the IO-Link Steering Committee. IO-Link is one of the fastest growing markets in automation industry, and ZMDI is at the center of that growth. 
In partnership with IQ2 Development GmbH, ZMDI provides universal IO-Link reference designs that were designed by Cypress: 
-- Universal IO-Link device equipped with ZIOL2401 Line Driver IC, Cypress 
FM0 Microcontroller and IQ2 Development IO-Link stack 
-- 2 Port IO-Link master with two ZIOL2401 Line Driver ICs, Cypress FM4 
Microcontroller and IQ2 Development IO-Link stack 
"We look forward to demonstrating our intelligent and most reliable IO-Link-compliant line driver IC family, and we hope to see you there," stated Markus Buchheim, Application Engineer for ZMDI. Meetings with the ZMDI team at this year's SPS IPC Drives 2015 event can be requested and scheduled by clicking here. 
About SPS IPC Drives 
The SPS IPC Drives conference is the largest user-oriented, German-language conference dealing with automation and drives technology. The dialogue between research, product development and applications is of central importance. New products, system solutions and concepts are presented and evaluated on a neutral basis. The topics of the SPS IPC Drives conference are divided and reach from the classic automation up to new fields of application, such as infrastructure, logistics and mobile machines. For more information, click here. 
About ZMDI 
Zentrum Mikroelektronik Dresden AG (ZMDI) is an award-winning global semiconductor company headquartered in Dresden, Germany, and specializing in enabling energy-efficient solutions. ZMDI is global supplier of analog and mixed-signal semiconductors solutions for automotive, industrial, medical, mobile sensing, information technology and consumer applications. These solutions enable their customers to create the most energy-efficient products in multi-market sensing, including automotive and mobile; power management; motor controlling; battery management; and other industrial application-specific standard products (ASSP). 
For over 50 years, ZMDI has been globally headquartered in Dresden, Germany. ZMDI serves customers directly (click here for more information) as well as through global distribution partners located throughout Europe, Asia and Americas. 
See more at www.zmdi.com. 
The URL for this news release is http://www.zmdi.com/news/press-releases-news/
